comment: Professor Blackwell is very well versed in his profession. You will learn a lot through his lectures and by being hands on at the farm.
This class is great, it's easy as all get out, and you'll actually learn a lot. He basically gives you the answers to quiz and test questions, so just show up and you'll get an A

Incredible teacher, I don't know that I've ever met someone so knowledgable on the subject they lecture on. Lots of hands on experience at the farm, which helps get the concepts across. I love that he is always ready to go above and beyond to help you understand or get more knowledge in your areas of interest. Probably my favorite teacher to date.

AWESOME TEACHER! Super nice and understanding, approachable. Really loves what he is doing. The class itself is fairly easy, you have to read a few chapters every other week or so and take quizzes. One individual project, fairly easy, HIGHLY RECOMMMEND!
